name: Shark Survival
description:
This Game is still in its Prototype and was built for Coding Blocks Game Jam '22. 

To move, use the "W" & "S" Keys or the "Up" & "Down" Arrows. To Dodge obstacles Press "Space", although it has its own restrictions and cooldown. 

There are a few power-ups to help you out and some obstacles to slow you down. Can You Run Away from the shark? Can't wait to find out :D

Coding: Moxtas

Art / Design: FocusCreations
